message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1150000. It's a valuable asset that I believe will be a great addition to your business.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1050000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $1050000 is significantly below what I'm willing to accept. I'm willing to come down to $1100000 to keep the negotiations moving forward. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1050000. I'm confident that's a fair price for the product.
